title: Warm welcome for President Rajapaksa in China
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Sri Lanka’s President Mahinda Rajapaksa arrived in Shanghai, China, on Saturday, 30 October, to attend the closing ceremony of the Expo 2010 trade Exhibition. Over 70 million visitors had attended this impressive event during the 180 days in which it took place in Shanghai. On…
